brief.content-text: The diagram depicts the O S I model with the Network Layer highlighted. A man sitting at a PC is shown with data flowing down the seven layers of the O S I layers from the Application Layer to the Physical Layer. The Physical Layer is connected to a group of interconnected routers. Data is flowing from the routers to a PC at the Application Layer. As data is communicated, devices use the Transport Layer to connect processes, and the Network Layer enables devices to reach each other.
